- 90 days free access

- Upload visuals to create your library

- Invite your team to participate

  • Order two new videos - or
  • Order one new video and two additional formats - or
  • Order one video and 10 small changes

en.public.plan.tooltip.PREMIUM:

en.public.pages.products.title: Become a VIBBIO user
en.public.pages.products.information:
Choose a user plan, and order the video production you need. With VIBBIO, you can:

  • Store and sort all visual content in your library
  • Collaborate with your team to order videos
  • Receive publish-ready videos tailored to your brand within days
  • Book filming and content specialists when needed
en.public.pages.products.credits.info.first: Credits are used for all types of orders from your user account.
en.public.pages.products.credits.info.secon:
Options include:

  • Book new videos from existing content in your library
  • Create several intros and outros based on one film (for A/B testing)
  • Order multiple language versions
  • Get formats tailored to wanted publising channels
  • Book filming & content help when needed
  • Buy VIBBIO stock images and clips
en.public.pages.products.credits.info.third: Your credits will automatically be <u>renewed</u> each month.
en.public.pages.products.credits.info.extra: You can always order extra credits when you need more videos or extra help.
Our extra credit packages can be added directly from your account.
Credit packages are: 200, 500, 1000 & 2000
en.public.pages.products.booking.title: Book video production
en.public.pages.products.booking.descriptio:
VIBBIO Productions is a full-service, fast-moving production team. We tailor-make videos to suit all your marketing and communication needs. Our video producers and content creators have vast experience in tailoring visual content - bringing to life strong, modern brands.

  • A production includes the process from idea to completion, with 2 producers and a content specialist
  • Book one - or a series of videos
  • Filming and content help can also be booked directly from our user accounts - on a need basis
en.public.pages.products.booking.video.on.d: VIBBIO offers a great solution for achieving high video output, tailored to your brand and digital channels.
If you sign up for a user account, you will receive all recordings and clips, ensuring full flexibility to create additional videos from your content.
en.public.pages.products.booking.single.mul: Would you like some ideas about how to use video?
We work with customers in a wide range of sectors, helping them to create ef cient and tailored video content.
en.public.pages.products.pricing.title: Pricing
en.public.pages.products.pricing.descriptio: Our products can be tailored to suit your company’s video production needs.

en.public.pages.faq.title: FAQ
en.public.pages.faq.description.first.line: Here is a comprehensive list of our most frequently asked questions.
en.public.pages.faq.description.second.line: If you are unable to  nd the answer you are looking for, get in contact with us anytime.
My clips are too long to upload, what can I do?
While we are in beta, the maximum file size is 700 MB. If you have a larger file, send it to help@vibbio.com and we can upload it for you.
Can I make  changes once I’ve placed an order?
As the video is based on your instructions, you can use your credits to make changes or create a new version.
What file types can I upload?
We accept these file types: jpeg, jpg, png, ai, eps, photoshop, cr2, mp4, mts, m2ts, .mov.
Can I order a video without becoming a user?
You sure can! Either order a full production, or start a free trial and purchase credits to place an order.
How long will it take before I get my video?
Anywhere from 2-10 days, depending on your user plan. Compare user plans under the 'Products'-tab in the main menu.
Can I hire someone to help me with filming or text?
Yes, you can order this using your monthly credits
Can I get the video texted in multiple languages?
Yes, you order it as a new version from the “My videos”-section.
Can I get help with planning my video composition?
Our content specialists are happy to help you structure your video. This can also be booked using credits.
How can I add/remove team members in my account?
Go to My Account -> Account Settings, and look for the “Team Members” section.
Where can I update my billing information?
Go to “My Account”, and click “Account settings”. Remember to hit “Save changes” when you’re done.
How do I cancel my user plan?
If you are the account administrator, you can email help@vibbio.com, and we will take care of it.
My library is full. Can I buy more storage space?
Yes, by upgrading your user plan in Account Settings. See user plan comparison under 'Products' in the main menu.
You can use credits to order new videos with the length and format of your choice, book specialist assistance (content and filming), make changes to finished videos (like music, call to action or language) and buy stock material (coming soon!)
How can I buy more credits?
You can easily buy extra credits in your library, or upgrade your user plan in your Account settings.
How much does filming and content help cost?
Where do I order filming and/or content help?
You can book it directly from your library, or you can contact us for assistance.
Can I cancel/reschedule my filming/content booking?
Just email orders@vibbio.com at least 24 hours before the booking, and we can help you out.
How can I order a full production?

We have a full team of content specialists and video producers that would love to help you out. Read more in the 'Book video production'-section under products. Fill out the contact form, and we will get back to you with a price estimate so that we can get started.
Can I reuse the content from previous videos in a new order?
When you become a VIBBIO user, we will upload all previous recordings to your user library, which means that you can reuse the same clips in new videos.
What are the prices for a full production?

Prices will vary from 30.900-40.900 NOK based on the complexity of the production and if you order a single video or a series. Read more under the 'Book video production'-section under 'Products' in the main menu.
What happens at the end of my free trial? Can I extend my trial period?
When your 90 day free trial ends, your user account will be deactivated if you do not choose a paid user plan. Don’t worry, we will contact you towards the end of the trial period to remind you!
Will I keep the drafts and library content from my trial account if I upgrade?
Of course! We wouldn’t want you to lose all your content.
How can I buy credits to purchase a video?
When you want to place an order, you can buy credits directly from your order form. These will be billed through invoice.
How/when do I pay for the video?

If you are a VIBBIO user, your company will be billed monthly via invoice. For full video productions, we charge 50% before and 50% after completion. For trial periods, we send you an invoice per credit purchase.
How do I change my billing information?
Go to “My Account”, and click “Account settings”. Remember to hit “Save” when you’re done.
Where can I find my invoice?
The invoice will be sent to the email address you provide in your Billing Information on a monthly basis. If you need a new invoice, or a copy of a receipt, you can email us at help@vibbio.com.
How can I upgrade/downgrade my user plan?
You can find that option in your Account Settings. If you want to know more about our different user plans, click 'Products' in the main menu.
en.public.footer.cookie.information: We use cookies on our pages to give you the best user experience. By continuing to use our pages you agree to this.
en.cookies.page.title: Privacy Policy on Cookie Usage

cookies.page.paragraphs.title: About cookies
paragraphs: Cookies are very small text files that are stored on your computer when you visit some websites.
We use cookies to help identify your computer so we can tailor your user experience and remember where you are in the order process.
You can disable any cookies already stored on your computer, but these may stop our website from functioning properly.

cookies.page.paragraphs.title: This website will:
paragraphs: - Remember your registered information and uploaded files
- Remember where you are in the order process
- Remember that you are logged in and that your session is secure. You need to be logged in to complete an order.
The following are not Strictly Necessary, but are required to provide you with the best user experience and also to tell us which pages you find most interesting (anonymously).

cookies.page.paragraphs.title: We also include third party cookies:
paragraphs: - To track the pages you visits via Google Analytics
- To allow you to share pages with social networks such as Facebook

cookies.page.paragraphs.title: This website will not:
paragraphs: - Share any personal information with third parties.

en.terms.and.conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
en.terms.and.conditions:
Terms and conditions - Purchase of product

Acceptance

Please read these Terms and Conditions of product carefully before ordering or purchasing any service or product from VIBBIO AS. Your order or purchase of the service is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions apply to all visitors, users and others who place an order or purchase VIBBIO AS services and products.

Prices and Payments

The Purchaser will be billed monthly for their subscription and additional purchase of credits. Payment is due 14 days from invoice date. Late payment calculated interest on arrears by the state prevailing rates. Privilege of use for completed product is directly dependent on the monthly fee being paid on time.

 

Changes to finished product/order

Purchaser may not make changes or additions to their order within the general 2 - 5 days of production time in or to drawings, designs, specifications, instructions for work or place of delivery. The purchaser may request changes to finished product for an additional amount of given or purchased credits.

 

Force majeure

VIBBIO bears no responsibility or risk for failure or delay in delivery caused by circumstances beyond VIBBIO's control. This includes, but is not limited to, natural disasters, terrorism, strikes or other labor disputes, inadequate or damaged infrastructure or fire. VIBBIO is obliged to inform the customer without undue delay if it knows of information that means the project cannot be fulfilled as agreed. VIBBIO reserves the right to cancel and evacuate any recording or event where VIBBIO, its equipment and crew are used, if there are, or circumstances arise, that make it imprudent to safety. This includes, but is not limited to, improper use of the equipment, change in the weather, lack of emergency exits or for other technical conditions, riots or distress as well as threats or violence against VIBBIO’s crew.

 

Warranty

Delivered product is created based on the customer's uploaded content and text. VIBBIO AS is not responsible for missing content, text or wrongly implemented content in the uploading process caused by the customer. VIBBIO AS follows the description delivered by the customer to the best of our knowledge when creating a finished product. There is no warranty to delivered product.

Termination

The purchaser has a right to terminate the purchase within 2 hours after the order has been placed. A confirmation from a VIBBIO representative must be received by e-mail for the termination to be valid. The total payment will be cancelled when a valid termination is in place.

Changes to Terms and Conditions

We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to replace or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. We will notify you either through the email address you have provided us, or by placing a prominent notice on our website if any material changes are made to the Terms and Conditions. We will determine what constitutes a material change at our sole discretion.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us.

Discount Codes

Customers who have a discount code may be subject to variations in payment method or delivery time.

 

Terms and conditions of Use

Please read these Terms and Conditions of Use carefully before using the website vibbio.com and the video production tools operated by VIBBIO AS. Your access to, and use of the service is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions apply to all visitors, users and others who access or use the VIBBIO AS Services.

By accessing or using the VIBBIO Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of the Terms and Conditions, then you may not access the VIBBIO Service.

 

Purchases

If you wish to purchase any product or service made available through the vibbio.com website, you may be asked to supply certain information relevant to your purchase order including, without limitation, videos, images, sound, logos and text.

Termination

We may terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms and Conditions.

Uploading Content

Our Service allows you to post, link, store, share and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, videos, or other material. You may not upload any images, designs, or other material protected by copyright without the permission of the actual copyright owner. By uploading images, designs, sound or other material to the vibbio.com website or otherwise providing VIBBIO AS with such images, designs, or other material, the uploading party warrants and represents that:

It owns all of the copyright in such designs, images, or other material;

  • It has received permission from the entity or person who owns the copyright in such designs, images, sound or other material; or
  • That the designs, images, sound or other material are in the public domain.
  • The uploading party further warrants and represents that it otherwise has the full and exclusive right to provide and/or upload such images, designs, sound or other material and that such providing or uploading, or any use by VIBBIO AS, will not infringe any interests or rights of others and the uploading party agrees to indemnify VIBBIO AS for all damages awarded against and all attorney cost and fees incurred by VIBBIO AS for any such infringement. By uploading images, designs, sound or other material onto the vibbio.com website, the uploading party grants VIBBIO AS the non-exclusive right and license to display, copy, publish, distribute, modify, transmit, print, and use such images, designs, or other material.

It is not allowed to upload illegal or offensive content to our website. VIBBIO AS is not responsible and does not condone the use of any offensive or illegal content uploaded to vibbio.com and will report any illegal activity on our website to the authorities.

 

Rights and publishing

VIBBIO owns the copyright to all recordings made by the VIBBIO team. The customer owns the copyright to all finished produced material delivered by VIBBIO.

The customer has the rights of use for online publishing in Norway and the rest of the world. The customer is solely responsible to make sure that the publication does not violate Norwegian law, regulation or infringing on image, audio and other content. VIBBIO shall be kept free of charge in any publication.

Raw files and recordings from a customer's VIBBIO video shoots will be made available to the customer for the duration of their subscription on vibbio.com, but are limited to only being used for new video orders made through the website. Terms of amendments, rights and publication also apply in specific cases where the raw material is delivered to the customer.

Storing uploaded content

All content uploaded to the vibbio.com website will only be stored for the time period agreed upon in the subscription selected by the customer. VIBBIO AS will not be responsible for storing/saving content when the subscription is terminated or expired.

All uploaded content will be auto-stored in Google cloud. This means that any files uploaded to our website will still exist in Google cloud, regardless of whether a customer deletes the file in his/her account.

Links To Other Web Sites

Our Service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by VIBBIO AS. VIBBIO AS has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party web sites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that VIBBIO AS shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such web sites or services. 

Terms and conditions - Privacy Policy

VIBBIO AS operates through http://www.vibbio.com. This section informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of personal information we receive from users of the site and our services.

We use your personal information only for improving and providing the site. You agree to the use and collections of information by using the site.

 

Information Collection and Use

To identify or contact you while using our site and services, we will ask you to provide us with personal identifiable information. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to your name, e-mail, phone number, billing information and company name.

Log Data

Whenever you visit our site we collect information sent by your browser. This log data may include information such as your computer Internet Protocol ("IP") address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our site that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages and other statistics. In addition, we may use third party services such as Google Analytics that monitor, analyze and collect all collected information.

Communications

We may use your personal information to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information that is crucial to the service provided by VIBBIO AS.

Cookies

Cookies are files with small amount of data, which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a web site and stored on your computer hard drive. Like many sites, we use "cookies" to collect information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our site.

Security

The security of your personal information is very important to us. We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, but we cannot guarantee its absolute security. No method of electronic storage or transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

Changes to Terms and Conditions

We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to replace or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. en.finished.videos.title: Finished videos
en.my.videos.title: My videos
en.public.pages.inspiration.whyvideo.title: Why video?
en.public.pages.inspiration.whyvideo.descri:
83 percent of marketeers said they would create more video content if they didn’t have restraints such as time and resources.

So, we started VIBBIO.

And now, you can say bye-bye to all restraints!
en.public.pages.inspiration.whyvideo.banner: By 2019, online video will account for 80% of all web traffic.
There are 22 bn video views every day on social media.
Videos are 12 x more likely to be watched than text is to be read.
en.public.pages.inspiration.whyvideo.text.1: Videos are 12 times more likely to be watched than text is to be read. Why? Movement grabs your attention.
en.public.pages.inspiration.whyvideo.text.2: If you are in the marketing department of your company (or actually any department) it is time to focus more on video. Here’s some key facts:
en.public.pages.inspiration.whyvideo.text.3:
• Video posts on social media have an average organic reach of 50%! This is a lot compared to other ways to share your information. Image posts: 33% - Link posts: 21% - Status updates: 16%
  • We see the effects of this in how users interact with video. A survey showed that 92% of mobile video consumers share videos with others. 80% of users recall a video they viewed in the past 30 days, and 90% of users say that product videos are helpful when making decisions on what to purchase.
  • Including a video in email marketing has had a proven effect on click-through-rate with 200-300%.
  • Including a video on your company’s landing page can increase conversions by 80%.
Keep it to max 60 seconds, and most people will watch the whole thing..
Present your key point first, and grab the viewer’s attention.
85% watch videos without the sound on!
Create content FOR them, not AT them.
en.public.pages.inspiration.ideas.title: Video ideas
en.public.pages.inspiration.ideas.descripti: Video is quickly becoming the most efficient and successful tool for internal communication and external marketing.
en.public.pages.inspiration.ideas.banner.qu: "Video is a MEGA TREND, we now need toolsets that are video-first"
en.public.pages.inspiration.ideas.banner.bo:
• Re-use blog posts, articles, white papers or reports and make a video
  • Show-and-tell from events: interviews of speakers and participants on specific topics
  • Employer branding: Present your employees
  • Customer testimonials: Let them say why they love your product AND how they use it
  • Product announcements and special offers
  • Host a contest to gain more traffic to your site and more visibility for your company
  • How-to and tips & tricks videos
  • Company milestones and big accomplishments

• Weekly/monthly video from the CEO (with updates and reports)
  • Add video to on-boarding process with new employees
  • Training on new products and services
  • Employee contributions to boost morale
  • Important updates to company procedures
  • Interview your employees about a topic
  • Open your presentation with a video

Imagine learning something new in a minute!

The way we adapt to new information is changing, and the education system needs to pay attention to this.

Both educational facilities and scientific institutions are of high importance when it comes to sharing knowledge – but how can this be done in a new and more effective way? The answer is video.

You have the knowledge – we have the communication tool.

«The future belongs to the curious»– VIBBIO

Want to become a VIBBIO user or order full video production?

Get in touch to find out more.
en.public.pages.inspiration.getstarted.desc:
We started VIBBIO because we love sharing knowledge, and video is the best communication tool. Here are some examples that will show you how simple it can be!

As you can see, simple variations in use of color, font size and text placement can make a huge impact. When you order from us, we’ll tailor make a video style based on your company’s visual profile.
en.public.pages.company.whatwedo.title: What we do & why
en.public.pages.company.whatwedo.descriptio:
The way we communicate is changing. Video is quickly becoming one of the most important tools for companies to stand out online.

However, video production is both expensive and time consuming – that’s why we started VIBBIO.

We recognised an urgent need for a new and better solution – and our mission to make smart video accessible, affordable and automatic.
en.public.pages.company.whatwedo.banner.tex: VIBBIO was founded 2016 in Oslo, Norway, by Marianne Bratt Ricketts and Stine Norum.
In just over a year, the company has grown to a team of 14 employees.
en.public.pages.company.whatwedo.box.1.head: Shaping the future of communication
en.public.pages.company.whatwedo.box.1.text: Our passion is IMPACT through learning; To empower people everywhere to be better equipped for our fast moving times and the future ahead.

Technological advanced are fuelling vast changes in most aspects of modern society – and to be able to make good choices and take advantage of new possibilities and a new reality, we need knowledge! We need to live in a flow of continued education, and always stay curious!

Video is the number one most efficient communication tool – and with our concentration span having been proven at just over a minute, a vibbio is a ONE minute long knowledge building video, tailor-made for ultimate reach and engagement. Imagine learning something new in a minute...!
en.public.pages.company.whatwedo.box.2.head: THE ULTIMATE FORMAT
en.public.pages.company.whatwedo.box.2.text: To reach audiences today, videos must:

• Have a hook
  • Be short
  • Texted (90% watch video without sound)
  • Targeted (create content for specific audiences)
en.public.pages.company.theteam.title: Team VIBBIO
en.public.pages.company.theteam.description:
VIBBIO is run by a team of marketing- design- media– and tech specialists, with deep understanding of how to reach a target market – and create strong and lasting visibility.

We love what we do – and having fun while doing it!
en.public.pages.company.customers.title: Our customers
en.public.pages.company.customers.descripti:
Wherever and whenever there’s a need for video – we can tailor a solution that works.

Here’s a selection of some videos we have produced.
en.public.pages.company.customers.banner.te: «Teamet fra VIBBIO forstod vårt konsept raskt og kom med kreative forslag til våre konsept filmer. Imponerende profesjonelt team som hjalp oss igjennom hele prosessen, fra idé til leveranse av filmer som vi ble svært fornøyd med. Ikke minst på svært kort tid og innenfor de betingelser vi avtalte.» – Knut Øyvind Blystad-Dammen, Co-Founder & CEO, My1Min

«I have had the pleasure of working with VIBBIO multiple times in various settings. They never fail to deliver. The team is positive, helpful and always ready on the fly. Their product is always delivered on time and produced in top-notch quality. I never fail to be immensely impressed after working with them.» – Isabelle Ringnes, Founder of TENK foundation
Selvaag Bolig, Aker BioMarine, Adecco, Aker Solutions, Evry, NHO, Microsoft, Orkla, Sapa Group, Visma, Danske Bank, Gelato
en.public.pages.company.theteam.board.1.tit: VIBBIO Board Member. Chariman of Nordic Impact
en.ordering.project.name.tooltip: Name your video. Example: "Fall campaign video 1"
en.ordering.description.tooltip: Example: We want to kick off our fall marketing campaign on Facebook with this video.The video should be eye - catching and fun.
en.ordering.publish.platform.tooltip: Some platforms prefer square videos while others use the more standard 16:9. Let us know where you want to publish the video, and we’ll suggest a suitable format and length.
en.ordering.format.tooltip:
16:9 - The standard video format that you see on ex. Youtube.

9:16 - “Vertical video”, a format optimized to fit a mobile screen.

1:1 - A normal square, perfect for Instagram, but also looks great on Facebook.

5:4 - This format is a bit taller than it is wide, so it is a step towards vertical video without being too drastic.
en.ordering.length.tooltip: Choose the length based on the chosen platform. Shorter is better on Facebook and Instagram, but on your website or Youtube, up to 60 seconds might be needed.
en.ordering.files.order.tooltip: Place your visual content in the right order. Drag, or click arrows, to change the order of your files.
en.ordering.files.clips.tooltip: Drop or upload your visual content into this column. If you want a plain background with text, leave the clips/image box empty. For video: remember to add timestamps so we know what part of the clip you want to use (ie. 00:11-00:25).
en.ordering.files.text.tooltip: Add the text you want in this column. Place it next to the chosen video clip/image.
en.ordering.files.comments.tooltip: Any specific requests for this clip? Add them here!
en.ordering.files.extra.tooltip: Upload extra visual content here, that can be used to pad out your video, if needed.
Upload your visual profile here. This will be used in all of your videos, unless you specify otherwise.
If you are not using a Google font, you can upload your font here. We accept .OTF, .TFF and .FNT files.
en.public.pages.signup.loggedin.heading: Uh oh! Looks like you're already logged in.
en.public.pages.signup.loggedin.info: We appreciate your eagerness, but you can't sign up again while you are logged in.
en.fileuploading.uploader.modal.title: Choose files to upload
en.fileuploading.uploader.modal.description: Max file size is 700MB. Allowed file types: jpeg, jpg, png, ai, eps, photoshop, tif, tiff, cr2, h.264, h.265, mp4, mpeg, m4v, mts, m2ts, mov, quicktime, mp3, wav, aiff, aif, aifc, aac, m4a, ogg, oga, wma.
en.pages.error.page.title: Error
en.pages.error.page.description: Sorry, we are currently having problems with our application. Please try again and contact us if the problem persists.
